divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work when I saw a bright shiny silver ball in the sky. The about 5 seconds after i first noticed it, a fire trail started behind it but no smoke . At first I thought it was a meteor but then noticed it was traveling straight up. I watched it for 2 minutes then it was gone.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dickson City
There were no other sightings in Dickson City on or around October 10th 2008
